item.title: I need a short form video creator for Tiktok/Instagram/YT Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
I need an almost full time video creator/poducer, You will need to be on the camera and experienced.

IWe will research the content idea, break-down the elements to the hook, CTA, measure KPIs and more. So the content we need will be pretty straight forward.

We need:
- You to record
- You to edit
- You to add captions
- You to script (we may assist).

We want to produce a lot of short-form video content (one piece can be repurposed across YT shots, TT and IG reels). We may also use the content as ads.

Experienced people who are comfortable in-front of camera who have a portfolio only. Don't waste time.

Full-time + bonuses available

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:11 UTC
Category: Video Production

item.title: Davinci Resolve Cloud Editor - Create Series of Stories in shared cloud project - Upwork
item.description:
Work within a shared Davinci Resolve Cloud project file that we have already created a longer form video. Create a series of social media shorts (stories) - vertical resolution - based on our main speakers comments in an interview.  Each separate video would be created on a new timeline in our shared project. You will have access to the rest of our project files and original timeline.  Because only Proxy files will be synced to you we will do the final color-grade in-house and provide final export.

We have a transcript of the interview and it was shot with A and B cam. as well as folder of great B-roll.

We need 12 social stories created from this project and the turnaround should be about 7-10 days.

We would like to see concepts of one first, with styling and music. Once the first is approved you can execute on the rest.  The idea is to create a cohesive series.

Subject matter is about social etiquette, party planning, and events. The main speaker is a book author and this series will help as a lead up to a new book launch.

Sample to our main video here: https://vimeo.com/clintbrewerphoto/review/968878735/58b1a67b11


Thank you.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for Care Home Educational Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled videographer to capture footage inside care homes for educational purposes and funding campaigns. As a videographer, you will be responsible for creating high-quality videos that highlight the daily activities, care services, and positive impact of care homes. The videos will be used to raise awareness, educate the public, and attract potential sponsors and donors.

Key responsibilities:
- Conduct on-site video shoots in various care homes
- Capture engaging and compelling footage of residents, staff, and activities
- Edit and enhance video content to create polished and professional videos
- Collaborate with the team to ensure the videos align with the project objectives and target audience

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a videographer, with a portfolio showcasing similar projects
- Proficiency in operating video equipment, including cameras, lighting, and sound equipment
- Strong knowledge of video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Ability to work independently and meet project deadlines
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level videographer who can bring creativity, technical skills, and a keen eye for detail to produce impactful videos.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$65.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:03 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Camera, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Camera, Video Post-Editing
Country: Ukraine
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400

item.title: Movie-Style Promotional Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video producer/editor to create a promotional video for our website. The final product should have a movie-style with a documentary feel, featuring a clear narrative structure, including an intro, high points, and an outro.

Our client specialises in designing and operating advanced data centre infrastructure, essential for powering AI and cloud computing. Their facilities support critical AI operations and data storage solutions. The video will highlight key topics discussed during filming and the data centre.

Project Details:
- Style: Movie-style with a documentary feel
- Content: Include all relevant footage from the days of filming, focusing on the data centre and key topics discussed
- Subtitles: Add subtitles to the parts where people are speaking
- Narrative: Craft a coherent story from the footage, using the filmed scripted content provided
- Length: 3 - 5 minutes

Deliverables:
- A 3 - 5 minute promotional video that meets the above criteria
- All project files upon completion

Please include the following in your application:
- A quote for the project
- An estimated timeline for completion
- Examples of previous work


Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Narrative Video, Promotional Video, Audio Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Narrative Video, Promotional Video, Audio Editing, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Full Time Tiktok UGC Creator for Healthcare Brand - Upwork
item.description:
Company: Welzo.com

Location: Remote

About Welzo.com:
Welzo.com is a leading healthcare website dedicated to providing users with comprehensive healthcare tips, knowledge, and resources. We are committed to enhancing the health and well-being of our audience by delivering accurate and engaging content.

Job Description:
Welzo.com is seeking a creative and motivated Full-time UGC TikTok Creator to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be passionate about healthcare, knowledgeable about current trends, and skilled in creating engaging content for social media platforms, particularly TikTok. As a UGC TikTok Creator, you will be responsible for producing high-quality videos that educate and inspire our audience on various healthcare topics.

Responsibilities:

Create and post 3 high-quality TikTok videos daily that provide healthcare tips, knowledge, and insights.
Develop and execute content ideas that align with Welzo.com's mission and goals.
Engage with our audience by responding to comments and messages on TikTok and other social media platforms.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in social media, particularly TikTok, to ensure content is relevant and engaging.
Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content strategies and campaigns.
Track and analyze the performance of TikTok videos and provide regular reports on engagement and reach.
Ensure all content adheres to Welzo.com's guidelines and maintains a professional tone.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a TikTok Creator with a portfolio of successful videos.
Strong understanding of TikTok and other social media platforms.
Excellent communication and storytelling skills.
Knowledgeable about healthcare topics and trends.
Ability to work independently and meet daily content creation goals.
Creative mindset with the ability to generate unique and engaging content ideas.
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
Ability to analyze social media metrics and adjust strategies accordingly.
Familiarity with video editing tools and software.
Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience in healthcare content creation.
Experience managing social media accounts for brands or organizations.
A degree in healthcare, communications, marketing, or a related field.
Benefits:

Competitive salary.
Flexible working hours.
Opportunity to work remotely.
Be part of a mission-driven company focused on improving healthcare knowledge and awareness.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:35 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Marketing Strategy, Facebook, Content Writing, Instagram, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Branding, Internet Marketing
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Marketing Strategy, Facebook, Content Writing, Instagram, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Branding, Internet Marketing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Podcast Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are seeking an experienced podcast editor for both video and audio podcasts. The ideal candidate will be proficient in editing multi-camera setups (at least three angles) and comfortable with long-form content (45 minutes to 1 hour). In addition to editing the full podcast, we need multiple 10-15 minute breakout videos and 1-minute clips for shorts. Proficiency in creating engaging thumbnails is also required.

Responsibilities:

- Edit full podcast episodes, including cutting out dead space and switching between camera angles.
- Create multiple 10-15 minute conversation breakout videos.
- Produce 1-minute clips for social media shorts.
- Design and create visually appealing thumbnails for each episode.
- Deliver a rough draft within 24 hours via Frame.io for feedback and final adjustments.
- Incorporate B-roll and other elements based on notes and feedback.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in podcast editing, both video and audio.
- Proficiency in editing software
- Experience with multi-camera editing.
- Ability to work quickly and meet tight deadlines.
- Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for engaging content.

Preferred Styles:
We are looking for an editing style similar to that of Chris Williamson and George Janko.

Application Instructions:
Please submit your application along with detailed information about your podcast editing experience. Include examples of previous work that highlight your editing skills and style.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Podcast, Audio Editing, Podcast Production
Skills: Video Editing, Podcast, Audio Editing, Podcast Production
Country: United States
click to apply

- Produce 1-minute clips for social media shorts.
- Design and create visually appealing thumbnails for each episode.
- Deliver a rough draft within 24 hours via Frame.io for feedback and final adjustments.
- Incorporate B-roll and other elements based on notes and feedback.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in podcast editing, both video and audio.
- Proficiency in editing software
- Experience with multi-camera editing.
- Ability to work quickly and meet tight deadlines.
- Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for engaging content.

Preferred Styles:
We are looking for an editing style similar to that of Chris Williamson and George Janko.

Application Instructions:
Please submit your application along with detailed information about your podcast editing experience. Include examples of previous work that highlight your editing skills and style.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Podcast, Audio Editing, Podcast Production
Skills: Video Editing, Podcast, Audio Editing, Podcast Production
Country: United States

item.title: SM Content Director for a New Gen Art Project With 1B+ Audience - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there beautiful!

Our team at Portals is looking for someone who could join our small but mighty team.

We are looking for someone who can:

A) Come up with new video content ideas and make those ideas happen from A to Z (including video editing)
B) Work to reuse our current content from our content library
C) Optimize and schedule content according to the latest algo moods
D) Work together with our team to document and storytell the journey of building the Portals artwork.
E) Uplift our current SM visual style according to the designs provided by us.

It is a good opportunity to join a widely recognizable project with a real global impact and get a lot of views into your portfolio.

It is a fully remote, firstly part-time position.

Please check our socials and website before applying:
https://portals.org/
https://www.instagram.com/portals_org/
https://www.tiktok.com/@portals.org

Thank you!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$36.00

Category: Content Strategy

item.title: Videographer In Atlanta - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to help me capture a proposal it will roughly be about 1.5 hours of capture (could be 2-3 hours total time on location). This will be in Norcross Ga. The event is Thursday, June 26th The arrival time for setup will be around 7:15pm.

To clarify I am going to be shooting most of the main footage, you will be a B Cam operator, there is no editing involved, this will be an easy couple hours. I do not need a bunch of equipment, I will be there with my stuff, I just need a backup camera running, and for the B-Cam operating to be getting footage.

Budget: $200

item.title: Tiktok manager - Upwork
item.description:
TikTok Content Manager for Repurposing Instagram Reels

Job Description:

We are seeking an experienced TikTok content manager to repurpose over 75 Instagram Reels for TikTok. This short-term gig involves downloading our existing Reels, removing Instagram watermarks, replacing music with fresh tracks, and enhancing the videos with engaging graphics and AI-generated voiceovers using TikTok's in-app features.

Key Responsibilities:

Download Instagram Reels: Access our Reels via a provided free service.
Remove Watermarks: Cleanly remove all Instagram watermarks from the videos.
Music Replacement: Strip original audio and synchronize videos with new TikTok-friendly music.
Upload and Enhance: Upload the refined videos to TikTok, adding modern graphics and engaging elements as per our brand's style.
Hash Tag Optimization: Utilize provided hashtags and rotate them to analyze performance for optimal engagement.
Listicle Creation: Combine multiple Reels into a single listicle-type video post, complete with AI-generated voiceovers.
Analytics and Reporting: Provide reports on video performance and engagement metrics.
Requirements:

Proven experience in managing and growing TikTok accounts with a strong portfolio or case studies.
Proficiency in video editing and familiarity with TikTok's in-app editing tools.
Ability to work with AI voiceover tools and understand the best practices of content creation on TikTok.
Excellent attention to detail and creativity in video marketing.
Strong communication skills and ability to adhere to deadlines.
put 19047 in the cover letter to be considered.

Project Duration:

This is a short-term gig with potential to extend based on performance and growth metrics.
To Apply:

Please submit your resume along with references of past TikTok growth projects.
Include direct links to TikTok accounts you have managed or grown, highlighting specific campaigns or videos you have worked on.
We are excited to explore TikTok as a new platform for our brand, and we look forward to seeing your creative approach to repurposing our content to captivate and expand our audience.



Budget: $45
Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:20 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Video Editing, Instagram, Content Management, Social Media Marketing
Skills: TikTok, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Video Editing, Instagram, Content Management, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Freelance Teaser Ad Creator (5-10 Second Video) - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a creative video editor to produce a high-impact, short teaser video that conveys the essence of our upcoming product in a visually striking way. This is a one-time project.

Responsibilities:
Conceptualize and develop a 5-10 second teaser video that aligns with our brand and marketing objectives.
Create a visually engaging video that captures attention and sparks curiosity.
Ensure the final video meets all technical specifications and is delivered in the required format.

Requirements:
Proven experience in creating short, impactful teaser videos or promotional content.
Proficiency in video editing software.
Strong creative skills with an eye for detail and design.
Ability to deliver high-quality work within tight deadlines.
Excellent communication skills to understand and implement feedback.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:13 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Production, Trailer
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Production, Trailer
Country: Canada
click to apply
